One of very few games that has significantly shaped the gaming world, its name spanning almost two decades now. Counter Strike is one of the greatest games of all time, and its Global Offensive title is yet another piece that many will reminisce in the future.

Great game if you can get past the first few hours and begin to understand the game, has a huge skill ceiling and can be very satisfying, solo queue however can be extremely frustrating so especially when you are new to the game i would advise playing with friends as in solo queue you can be really screwed over by your teammates and have a terrible experience.
